
Intercepted messages from two agents shared a prime in their public keys. Recover the secret from the flawed RSA implementation: ciphertext1: 637038331605560937400317946791169249611249612577782073983755153205178337361912871250323213922762259741642984387100047499104857204743109465598642168914552778404207573210222462637484124160610752614086307266744317501543020592101495873, ciphertext2: 542824962785689216639034790951495092977761826344181050780545744534021616404839828897666871736608173934751039618267333956656005960658826754023938989881736409196356395763577607508672887599364613699474472111454582754486376737363062555


The flag format is flag{...}
n1=798783457530936748904910128501105089446091290106311615768449845332280675714940764864807055796567327307376307294016016781414056900820644761090614306281127962175715900776482890211085756711094615617394805187525137290463334195862413811, n2=626538855429974954941243537336785282070139254282407267011431060099241922030874172676228518895025600732734403867448803118166914093844899972913799086450338629620913436441566022855844241782830574129071473238899385330726446783037238479, e=401072633191043273820026593217369930115729638187342314657127983191085852951182802583763903699479921517248053087186322163717747821695530950032855486862496914583031524845425599086120231968083389668835662234225075828623020441156954521

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{aih7yov1}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: ciphertext1: 637038331605560937400317946791169249611249612577782073983755153205178337361912871250323213922762259741642984387100047499104857204743109465598642168914552778404207573210222462637484124160610752614086307266744317501543020592101495873, ciphertext2: 542824962785689216639034790951495092977761826344181050780545744534021616404839828897666871736608173934751039618267333956656005960658826754023938989881736409196356395763577607508672887599364613699474472111454582754486376737363062555
vulnerability: common factors
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common factor, computing GCD(n1, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n1=798783457530936748904910128501105089446091290106311615768449845332280675714940764864807055796567327307376307294016016781414056900820644761090614306281127962175715900776482890211085756711094615617394805187525137290463334195862413811, n2=626538855429974954941243537336785282070139254282407267011431060099241922030874172676228518895025600732734403867448803118166914093844899972913799086450338629620913436441566022855844241782830574129071473238899385330726446783037238479, e=401072633191043273820026593217369930115729638187342314657127983191085852951182802583763903699479921517248053087186322163717747821695530950032855486862496914583031524845425599086120231968083389668835662234225075828623020441156954521
extra_info: p=31896065840639512374066428021931176178791913367246105550126001437916354860230283593119685978970480460637709988566647, q=25043322318239898466257422585231417129360347573657000423094012735529933581797333143719680219067793152557031540794213, r=25018200359688120156966845266886716387473670954745552872481385582394110668643175855830668127616319324510781238107683, φ(n1)=798783457530936748904910128501105089446091290106311615768449845332280675714940764864807055796567327307376307294015959842025898021409804437240007143687819809914774997670509670196912310422652588000657965821327099016850139454333052952, φ(n2)=626538855429974954941243537336785282070139254282407267011431060099241922030874172676228518895025600732734403867448753056644236165826276748645946968316821795602385033888270447457526317738580133620071922890552701218249378970258336584
